caption=Damrod from ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]''
clothing=Green gauntlets, clad in green and brown of varied hews

column1: Damrod was the companion of [[Mablung (ranger of Ithilien)
column2: Mablung]] and a trusted guard of [[Faramir]].  Together he and Mablung watched [[Frodo Baggins
column4: Sam]] during the ambush of the [[Haradrim
column5: Men of Harad]] in [[Ithilien]].  While they waited before the battle Damrod told the hobbits of the Enemy's dealings with the Southrons.  Damrod had little hope; he believed "the days of [[Gondor]] are numbered, and the walls of [[Minas Tirith]] are doomed".<ref name="herbs"/>

column1: After the ambush Damrod and Mablung continued to serve as watch-guards over the hobbits as the Rangers journeyed to [[Henneth Annûn]].<ref>{{TT
'''2002: ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'':'''
